skills.description: Increases movement speed by 20%. Deals damage (Low) + knocks up (Active time = 15 seconds)
Pushes an enemy along with him + deals damage (Medium) + shield-break (deals additional damage if this effect is triggered)
Increases energy recovery speed by 50%
Quick with ATK (Rush) Disc, but slow with TRAP and HEAL Discs
Regenerates HP by 20% every second for all teammates (Active time = 10 seconds)
Quickly jumps backwards while also deal damage (Low) to one enemy in front + paralyzes that enemy
Reduce damage taken by 40% when using HEAL Disc (Active time = 3 seconds)
Quick with HEAL Disc, but slow with ATK (Circumference) Disc
Creates a tornado to draw in the enemies towards her, then deals damage (High) + knocks them down
Jumps forward, deals AoE damage (Medium) + knocks down when landing
Reduces enemy ATK by 40% when she is being attacked (Active time = 2 seconds)
Quick with ATK (Circumference) and TRAP Discs, but slow with ATK (Long Distance) Disc
Creates 4 cages to imprison 4 enemies. The cages prevent them from taken damage while also block all of their attacks (Active Time = 5 seconds)
Binds a target + deals damage (Low). This skill is cancelled when she moves or takes damage (Maximum Active Time = 3 seconds)
Increase own movement speed by 20% when she locks on a target
Quick with MOVE Disc, but slow with ATK (Short Distance) and ATK (Rush) Discs
Deploys a shield that cuts off 100% incoming damage to all teammates by 100% (Active Time = 10 seconds)
Deploys a shield in front of him that cuts off 100% damage from long-range attacks (Active Time = 6 seconds)
When being killed, deploys a shield that cuts off 100% incoming damage to all teammates (Active Time = Indefinite, Can only block one attack)
Quick with close range ATK, BUFF, and MOVE Discs, but slow with WARP Discs
Generates a gravity field across the map, prevents the enemies team from flying (Active Time = 7 seconds)
Deals damage (Low) to enemies standing in front of user within the range + knocks them back
Regenerates by 3% every 2 seconds when HP falls below 30%
Quick with ATK (Rush) and BUFF Discs, but slow with MOVE Disc
Increases movement speed by 30% & attack speed by 30% for all teammates (Active Time = 12 seconds)
Deals damage (Medium) to the first enemy got hit + slows that enemy movement speed (Debuff time = 5 seconds)
Increases ATK by 30% when HP falls below 50%
Quick with BUFF Disc, but slow with ATK (Circumference) and ATK (Rush) Discs
Disguises mini map, objective information & kicker icon for the opposing team (Active Time = 12 seconds)
Disappears from mini map + becomes untargetable from auto attack and disc skill (Active time = 6 seconds)
When being killed, drops own weapon that explodes after 2 seconds, deals an AoE damage (Extremely High) + knocks back
Quick with WARP Discs, but slow with BUFF Discs
An arcane infinite-style attack that delivers a single devastating frontal blow
Creates a clone at current spot while teleports forwards at the same time (Clone Active Time = 4 seconds)
Refeshes cooldown of kicker skill when successfully performs perfect evasion
Quick with ATK (Circumference) Disc, but slow with ATK (Rush) Disc
Deploys a drone for each ally, drone emits smoke screen behind when moving. Enemies inside smoke screen cannot target allies and view minimap (Drone Active Time = 15 seconds)
Deploys a drone that slowly approaches target + seals all target skills (Sealing Time = 10 seconds, drone direction is unchangeable, stops when knocks into an object)
Increases active time of TRAP Disc by 5% with each use (up to 50%)
Quick with TRAP Discs, but slow with close range ATK Discs
Fires 12 homing missiles forwards, each missile deals damage (Low) separately
Jumps onto a missile and shoots backwards while moving a short distance forwards, deals damage (Low)
Increases own ATK by 15% for each taken down enemy, up to 75%. This effect resets when being killed
Quick with Long-range ATK Discs, but slow with HEAL Discs
Temporarily increases movement speed + increases attack speed to triple (Active Time = 10 Seconds)
Secures a target via her nunchaku, deals damage (Low) + drags it towards herself
Every time she hits an enemy with normal attack, she increases own ATK by 10%, up to 50% (Buff duration = 1 second)
Quick with close range ATK Discs, but slow with TRAP Discs
